freeSpeech.title: Free Speech
freeSpeech.text: She uses Bitnation to speak privately with clients. He uses Bitnation to speak privately with victims.

refugeeEmergencyResponse.title: Refugee      Emergency     Response
refugeeEmergencyResponse.text: He can show his documents from home. She can get a fair wage for her work.

education.title: Bitnation        Education        Network
education.text: She can get her high school diploma. He can study the languages he needs.

nations.title: Borderless       Decentralized      Nations
nations.text: They can form a nation to get a fair deal, enforce contracts, and share working knowledge.

walletPanel.empty: Create a wallet to use Pangea.

nationDetails.diplomaticRecognitionInfo: {{name}} is seeking diplomatic recognition from Earth governments as a sovereign entity.
nationDetails.profitInfo: The nation is managed as a {{profit}} entity.

createNation.title: Create A Nation
createNation.introduction: Reclaim your sovereignty by creating your own decentralized borderless voluntary nation(DBVN).

prompt.name: Nation name
prompt.represents: Nation represents an existing Earth country
prompt.diplomaticRecognition: Seeking diplomatic recognition as a sovereign entity.

createNation.locationTypeHint: Virtual nations exist only in Pangea. Geographic nations are on Earth.

createWalletPanel.title: $t(screens.wallet.empty.createWallet)
createWalletPanel.text: You need an Ethereum wallet to make payments, to create nations, and to use other useful services.

restoreWalletPanel.title: $t(screens.wallet.empty.restoreWallet)
restoreWalletPanel.text: You can restore your wallet if you lose or change your phone. You will need your private key to restore your wallet.

createProfilePanel.title: Become a World Citizen
createProfilePanel.text: Bitnation is a decentralized, open-source movement powered by blockchain technology. Bitnation offers a peer-to-peer voluntary governance system to compete with the prevailing top-down, one-size-fits-all, geographical apartheid Nation State model wherein your quality of life is arbitrarily defined by where you were born.

createKey.title: Create Wallet
introduction: To secure your wallet, you first need a "private key."
You must write down your private key on paper. This process only takes a few minutes.
If you change your phone, the only way to recover your wallet is by entering your private key!
Your private key protects everything in Bitnation, so save your written private key in a safe place.

beforeGrid: We will show you a group of {{KEY_LENGTH}} words that is the private key that unlocks your wallet.
afterGrid: Write the words on paper, in order. Store the paper in very safe place. If your device is lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded, you must have this key to restore or unlock your wallet.

instructions: Write each row of words on the piece of paper. Press “Next” when you have written the row.

verifyKey.title: Verify Private Key
instructions: Now that you have written down your private key, we will ask you to verify it.
You will type the {{KEY_LENGTH}} words of your private key into the app, and we will check that your written private key is correct.
Your private key protects everything in Bitnation, so be sure to put your paper with your private key in a safe place.
Enter in the correct order the {{KEY_LENGTH}} words that you wrote down as your paper key. Tap a box to begin.
Congratulations! You correctly entered your private key.
Now, put your paper with your private key in a safe place.

loadWallet.title: Load wallet
instructions: If you have a private key from another Bitnation wallet, you can use it here to add that wallet to this app.
For example, if you lost or upgraded your device, you will have to transfer wallets from that device to this one.
To load your wallet, we will ask you for the {{KEY_LENGTH}} words of your private key. You should have these on a piece of paper you store in a safe and secure place.

shareAddressPanel.title: Copy Address
shareAddressPanel.text: You can copy your wallet address and send any way you choose, e.g. SMS or email. Do not try to type your address by hand!

error.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Please check your wallet.

freudbot.initial1: Hi, I am Dr. FreudBot, your resident therapist. What is bothering you?
freudbot.initial2: Herr Professor Doktor FreudBot here, your therapy bot. What has been troubling you?
freudbot.initial3: I am the Pangea therapy bot, Dr. FreudBot, ready to help. I am not a real therapist, I just play one in this app.
freudbot.initial4: I'm here, Dr. FreudBot. Talk to me.
freudbot.initial5: Talk to me! I am Dr. FreudBot. Tell me about your mother.
freudbot.initial6: Hallo, Dr. FreudBot here. I am not a real Freudian. I am not real. Are you? Are you sure?
